article: One day, the master ordered his two servants to plant seeds while he was away. One servant _ the order of his master to his heart while the other servant only went on his own way. Every day the first servant worked _ . Though sometimes he felt tired, he never gave up . There were alse times when he got hurt because of stones and other _ objects.He knew that some day all his hard work would pay off . He believed his master would be _ with him. But the other servant thought that his master wouldn't _ what he was doing. He enjoyed his freedom and _ his own will. Many years passed; still the master did not come back . Bearing his master's promise, the faithful servant _ following him, while the other servant _ around the world. One day their master _ and was pleased when he found one servant in the field harvesting the crops but _ when he couldn't find the other one. The master called the two servants and _ why he had been gone for such a long time. He said that he had built beautiful houses as payment for the _ they provided, and those who had been faithful would be in their new houses. He asked them how good their _ was. The faithful servant _ annouced that he had achieved a lot every year while the other servant bowed down and asked for _ because he had nothing for his master. The master rewarded the first servant and gave him a new house but the other servant got _ and was punished. So let us remember to be like the faithful servant so that when our "master" comes back,we will be rewarded and not punished.
